hp.special: Use your Hit Points and Hit Dice

action.name: Multiattack (requires 5th+ level)
entries: You make two Bestial Strike attacks.

action.name: Bestial Strike
entries: Melee Attack: your Spell Attack Modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + your Wisdom modifier Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: You make two Bestial Strike attacks.

action.name: Bestial Strike
entries: Melee Attack: your Spell Attack Modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + your Wisdom modifier Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage.

hp.special: Use your Hit Points and Hit Dice

action.name: Multiattack
entries: You make two Bestial Strike attacks.

action.name: Bestial Strike
entries: Melee Attack: your Spell Attack Modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + your Wisdom modifier Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage.
